room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: We've done three different companies in three different states. This one was excellent. (We did the Casino Royale room here)

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: My family and I did the Casino room and absolutely loved it. If you're good at math, love suspension, and are fast with critical thinking then this room is for you! I would definitely recommend this place and looo forward to returning and trying other rooms

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: This was my first time. I was so excited and we picked The Casino Operation. It was not easy but thrilling and kept us on the edge of toes. I love how you really have to use critical thinking skills to solve it. We had such a good time. I recommend all to do it. We used a group on that is good Monday through Thursday only. Unfortunately, we did not escape but I can't wait to do it again.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: We went in the Casino room. We had a ball trying to figure those codes out. It was a little difficult and we didn't break out but got very close! Can't wait to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: We had so much fun! There were 6 in our group for Casino and we all are friends. It was a great time doing this game together and then enjoying a drink after to talk about it. We will be back. Looking forward to attempting all of the rooms!
